text: Miss World Vietnam 2019 is the first edition of the Miss World Vietnam pageant. It was held on August 3, 2019 at Cocobay, Danang, Vietnam. The pageant will crown the Vietnam representatives to compete in beauty pageants: Miss World 2019, Miss International 2019, Miss Grand International and Miss Intercontinental. ==Results ==
